original_title: Sri Lanka appoints Former Foreign Minister Bogollagama as new High Commissioner to UK
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Sri Lankan Foreign Minister Rohitha Bogollagama was appointed as the Sri Lankan High Commissioner to the UK.
The President's Office said that the appointment will be in effect from the 1st of August 2023.
Bogollagama, also served as the Governor of the Eastern Province.

SLBA calls for government engagement to facilitate debt recovery process.
